post.description: Enrich company information based on company name or website
Enrich contact information based on contact name or linkedin

name.description:
Name of the company you want to enrich. 
You must include either a company name or a website.

website.description:
Website of the company you want to enrich. 
You must include either a company name or a website.

firmographic.description:
Request firmographic data for the company you want to enrich. 

 Consumes 1 credit.

query.description:
Request AI queries you want to include in the enrichment request.
 You can use natural language to describe the query and our AI will do the rest.

Consumes 1 Credit

id.description: Unique identifier for the enrichment request

credits_used.description: Number of credits used for the enrichment request

credits_remaining.description: Number of credits remaining for the enrichment request

name.description: Name of the company, null if information not found

industry.description: Industry classification of the company, null if information not found

description.description: Short description of the company, null if information not found

revenue.description: Annual revenue range of the company, null if information not found

company_size.description: Employee count range of the company, null if information not found

location.description: Location of the company, null if information not found

country.description: Country where the company is headquartered

state.description: State where the company is headquartered

city.description: City where the company is headquartered

query_response.description: Response to any additional enrichment queries, empty if no query was provided

linkedinIdentifier.description: Linkedin Url of the contact you want to enrich. You must provide either linkedinIdentifier or nameIdentifier

nameIdentifier.description: Name and company name of the contact you want to enrich. You must provide either linkedinIdentifier or nameIdentifier

firstName.description: First name of the contact you want to enrich

lastName.description: Last name of the contact you want to enrich

companyName.description: Company name the contact you want to enrich

companyWebsite.description: Company website the contact you want to enrich

basicLinkedinInfo.description:
Request basic linkedin data for the contact you want to enrich.

Consumes 1 credit.

email.description:
Request email for the contact.

Consumes 2 credit if a valid email is found.

phone.description:
Request phone number for the contact.

Consumes 10 credit if a valid phone number is found.

query.description:
Request AI queries you want to include in the enrichment request. You can use natural language to describe the query and our AI will do the rest.

Consumes 1 Credit

id.description: Unique identifier for the enrichment request

credits_used.description: Number of credits used for the enrichment request

credits_remaining.description: Number of credits remaining for the enrichment request

linkedin_bio.description: Current linkedin bio for the contact, null if information not found

linkedin_headline.description: Current linkedin headline for the contact, null if information not found

linkedin_current_title.description: Current linkedin job title for the contact, null if information not found

linkedin_current_company.description: Current linkedin company for the contact, null if information not found

linkedin_job_description.description: Current linkedin job description for the contact, null if information not found

linkedin_education.description: Current linkedin education information for the contact, null if information not found

query_response.description: Response to any additional enrichment queries, empty if no query was provided
